name: A Change Machine
description:
Lock-in Vending Machine Series
Pre-sale object: A Change Machine

“The primitive ancestor of smart contracts is the humble vending machine.” Nick Szabo 1997

Game Rule 
1. 2 kinds of NFTs, [🎟 Change Machine ] & [🎰 Vending Machine]
2. [🎟 Change Machine] release date: 10/3(Sun) only on hic et nunc
3. [🎟 Change Machine] initial price: 0.07 XTZ with 7 edition
4. [🎟 Change Machine] collectors will receive one [🎰 Vending Machine] NFT AirDrop on 10/10. (Owner Screen Shot will be certified on 10/10)
5. [🎰 Vending Machine] release date: 10/10(Sun)
6. [🎰 Vending Machine] NFTs: 7 versions with 7 editions will be released
7. [🎰 Vending Machine] NFTs price: determined by the highest purchased price of  [🎟 Change Machine ] at secondary market.

These NFTs are the photographs of claw machine from Taiwan street-corner, ordinary but diversified. Token in 🪙 & Toy out 🕹. Who’s the toy?


《權力與玩具》預售公告 ⏰

「智慧合約的老祖宗是一台誠實的自動販賣機。」Nick Szabo 1997

投十問路 ，搖晃操縱桿，甩爪，保夾，Vendor Lock-in，誰制約了誰？

購買規則
1. 本次攝影作品展售分為兩種NFT，〈兌幣機〉與〈夾娃娃機〉
2. 〈兌幣機〉預售日期：10/3（日）
3. 〈兌幣機〉預售價格：0.07 XTZ，共發行 7 枚
4. 〈兌幣機〉持有者，於 10/10 當日持有將免費獲得〈夾娃娃機〉作品空投
5. 〈夾娃娃機〉正式發售日：10/10（日）
6. 〈夾娃娃機〉共 7 款，每款將鑄造 7 版
7. 〈夾娃娃機〉正式售價由〈兌幣機〉在次級市場的最高交易價而定

歡迎打台。
